title: だ
q: Can だ be used in the next sentence? If yes, can you omit it?
a: Yes, だ can be used with na-adjective. When used the sentence becomes more masculine.

title: だ
q: Can だ be used in the next sentence? If yes, can you omit it?
a: No, だ can't be used with i-adjective.
